title: If It's Pricey, It Must Be Tastier, And Other Lies Our Brains Tell
teaser: Why do we prefer Coke over a generic cola? Psychologist Paul Bloom tells the TED Radio Hour's Guy Raz that we come to believe something is better because we're told that it is.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
